alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 6:42AM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River At West affecting Attala and Holmes Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River at West. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Extensive flooding of agricultural land. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM CST Sunday the stage was 20.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.5 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Big Black River West 15.0 20.1 Sun 5 am CST 20.5 20.0 19.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 645 PM CST.
